Summary: quick snapshot on the flashed object during driving along express way from Las Vegas to LA
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving along express way, S. I-15 from Las Vegas to LA, I took a picture to the right in the seat next to the driver. When I was taking a picture across car window, I didn't notice any flashed object and there was no flash in the digital camera. But, this flashed object was taken in my picture. The location may be 100 miles away from Las Vegas in the express way.
